attributes.action: Save West Ham United - Get Clueless Curbs Out Now and any players that dont care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
West Ham United Football Club, should not find themselves in the position they currently are within the Premiership

A combination of excuses are being banded around to explain this, including bad luck, injuries, and the previous manager Alan Pardew

All poor excuses for the continuing poor performances of the players who still dont care, and the lack of ability and direction being shown, by the new manager Clueless Curbs

Despite the backing with his hard earned cash from the Eggsterminator, Curbs reign so far has been nothing short of shambolic

I'm sick of seeing him shaking his head in disbelief and I want to see results and passion

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
